TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MetaModel extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 ASP.NET 动态数据使用的一个或多个数据库。

span.span: Represents one or multiple databases that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类型可让你注册的动态数据 Web 应用程序的一个或多个数据上下文。The type lets you register one or multiple data contexts for a Dynamic Data Web application. 数据上下文是一个对象，表示数据库连接。A data context is an object that represents a database connection. 数据上下文具有访问权限表示的数据库，可通过该连接一个数据模型。A data context has access to one data model which represents a database that is available through that connection. 数据模型是一个对象，表示作为 CLR 类型的数据库的数据实体。A data model is an object that represents a database's data entities as CLR types. 动态数据支持基于 LINQ to SQL 和 ADO.NET 实体框架数据模型。Dynamic Data supports data models based on LINQ to SQL and on the ADO.NET Entity Framework. 在 Visual Studio 中，可以生成数据模型类型使用**LINQ to SQL 类**模板或**ADO.NET 实体数据模型**模板。In Visual Studio, you can generate data-model types by using the **LINQ to SQL Classes** template or the **ADO.NET Entity Data Model** template. 这些模板用于 LINQ to SQL 模型或 ADO.NET 实体数据模型设计器 （实体设计器） 的实体框架模型对象关系设计器 （O/R 设计器）。These templates use the Object Relational Designer (O/R Designer) for the LINQ to SQL model, or the ADO.NET Entity Data Model Designer (Entity Designer) for the Entity Framework model. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类型，执行以下任务来在 ASP.NET 网站中使用自动基架：The following example shows how to use type to perform the following tasks in order to use automatic scaffolding in an ASP.NET Web site: - 获取默认数据上下文的数据模型。Get the data model for the default data context. - 获取指定的数据上下文的数据模型。Get the data model for a specified data context. - 计算路由路径 （确定的 URL） 指定的表。Evaluate the routing path (determine the URL) for a specified table. 该示例包含一个页面及其代码隐藏文件。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PlaceHolder.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PlaceHolder.vb#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/PathModel.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/PathModel.aspx.vb#2)] 要编译该示例，您需要以下各项：To compile the example, you need the following: - [!INCLUDE[vs_dev10_long](~/includes/vs-dev10-long-md.md)] 或 [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]。or [!INCLUDE[vwd_exp_dev10_long](~/includes/vwd-exp-dev10-long-md.md)]. - 动态数据网站。A Dynamic Data Web site. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 创建一个新动态数据网站使用基架](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Creating a New Dynamic Data Web Site Using Scaffolding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1564aef2-9103-436a-9806-c8ad7abd616a). 此功能的运行时代码示例，请参阅：[运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel)。See a run-time code example of this feature: [Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel).

exception.span: 如果存在数据上下文注册错误，则可由任何方法引发。

span.span: Can be thrown by any method if there has been a data context registration error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数确定，以便可以检索使用是否全局注册的数据模型方法。This constructor determines whether the data model is registered globally so that it can be retrieved using the method. 它可以用来创建多个模型，避免类型冲突时使用相同的实体类型。It enables you to create multiple models and use the same entity types while avoiding type conflicts. 通常情况下调用构造函数中的`Application_Start`Global.asax 文件的方法。You typically call the constructor in the `Application_Start` method of the Global.asax file.

summary.span: 获取应用程序创建的数据模型的第一个实例。

span.span: Gets the first instance of a data model that is created by the application.
The data-model instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了简单的方法来引用默认数据模型实例。This property provides a simple way to reference the default data-model instance. 如果应用程序使用多个模型，则必须提供您自己的方式来存储对其他数据模型的引用。If the application uses multiple models, you must provide your own way to store references to the additional data models. 若要查找特定的数据模型，请调用方法。To find a specific data model, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用中的属性方法以获取默认数据模型。The following example shows how to use the property in the method to get the default data model. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For a complete example, see the class overview. summary.span: 通过使用指定的上下文配置并启用数据模型提供程序，注册数据上下文实例。

span.span: Registers a data-context instance by using the specified context configuration and by enabling a data-model provider.
or is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ResetRegistrationException() cil managed

summary.span: 重置可能发生的任何前一个上下文注册错误。

span.span: Resets any previous context registration error that might have occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时数据上下文注册过程中发生错误，异常缓存，并引发对所有后续操作。When an error occurs during data-context registration, the exception is cached and thrown on all subsequent operations. 例如，如果应用程序启动时出现错误，它将引发对每个请求。For example, if an error occurs at application start, it is thrown on every request. 调用以清除该错误并启用一个新的上下文注册要执行此方法。Call this method to clear the error and to enable a new context registration to be performed.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Tables As ReadOnlyCollection(Of MetaTable)

summary.span: 获取属于数据模型一部分的所有表的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all the tables that are part of the data model.

value.span: 一个包含属于数据模型的表的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the tables that belong to the data model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中包含数据模型，其中包括不可见的表中的所有表 （不是动态数据基架的一部分）。The collection contains all the tables in the data model, which includes the tables that are not visible (are not part of Dynamic Data scaffolding). [运行](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=TablesMenu.aspx)联机示例的此功能。[Run](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=120736&sref=System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel&spage=TablesMenu.aspx) an online example of this feature. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用和属性执行以下任务：The following example shows how to use the and properties to perform the following tasks: - 数据模型中获取所有表的集合并显示在`GridView`控件。Get a collection of all the tables in a data model and show them in a `GridView` control. - 获取可见表的集合中的数据模型和其显示在`GridView`控件。Get a collection of the visible tables in a data model and show them in a `GridView` control. 该示例包含一个页面及其代码隐藏文件。The example consists of a page and its code-behind file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/TablesMenu.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/TablesMenu.aspx#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/CS/TablesMenu.aspx.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.MetaModel/VB/TablesMenu.aspx.vb#6)]

returns.span: 如果找到了表元数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the table metadata is found; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法获取与指定的表相关联的元数据。This method gets the metadata that is associated with the specified table. 如果找不到表，此方法返回`false`。If the table is not found, this method returns `false`. 这不同于方法，将引发异常，如果找不到表。This differs from the method, which throws an exception if the table is not found.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property VisibleTables As List(Of MetaTable)

summary.span: 获取数据模型中可见表的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the visible tables in the data model.

value.span: 可见表是指启用了基架的表。

span.span: A visible table refers to a table that has scaffolding enabled.

value.span: 这意味着它是具有 List.aspx 页的表。

span.span: This means that it is a table for which a List.aspx page exists.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性来获取数据模型中可见表的集合。The following example shows how to use the property to get a collection of the visible tables in the data model. 有关完整示例，请参阅类概述。For a complete example, see the class overview.
